name: Intercom MCP Server Environment Variables
description: Environment variables for configuring the Intercom MCP server

INTERCOM_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Intercom API access token, required for authentication with the Intercom API.

INTERCOM_API_URL.description: Base URL for the Intercom API. Optional - defaults to https://api.intercom.io if not provided.

PORT.description: The port on which to run the server. Optional - defaults to 3000 if not provided.

MCP_SERVER_NAME.description: Name of the MCP server for Glama compatibility. Optional - defaults to 'Intercom MCP Proxy'.

MCP_SERVER_VERSION.description: Version of the MCP server for Glama compatibility. Optional - defaults to '1.2.0'.

MCP_ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: CORS allowed origins for the MCP server. Optional - defaults to '*' to allow all origins.
